subject: Greetings,
body:
Greetings,
You're eligible to receive €350,000.00 Euros = 372,190.00 US Dollars as COVID-19 Palliative fund. We are pleased to announce to you the result of the World Health Organization International live sms/email grant held (3) months ago.
Your mobile email was attached to a number: On behalf of the entire Covid-19 relief palliative team, we wish to congratulate all the sponsors, partners especially Telecom for providing the Mobile Directories for the Relief Programmed. individuals/company's emails that are due to receive their Covid-19 pandemic entitlements. Your emails are purportedly selected at random for the impact of the COVID-19 Palliative fund.
This claim is for production and financial losses as a result of damages caused by the COVID-19 PANDEMIC. Kindly get back to us and let us know which category is your unpaid entitlements. Also, indicate if you have received your entitlements or not. If you have not received yours kindly respond back.
Health topics:
Mental health - Abortion - Obesity - Cancer - Diabetes - Depression and Covid-19 Palliative Fund.
We Build Your Reputation
Best Regards
Teddy Flower
Information Unit
COVID-19 vaccination Monitor Dashboard
Eddlewood Public Hall, Hamilton

subject: Re:   Greetings,
body:
Hello Teddy Flower,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's interesting to hear about the World Health live sms email grant and the support it provides during these challenging times.

Could you please provide more details about the different categories of unpaid funds? Also, how does one qualify for these funds? I'm curious to know more about the process involved.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Lillie

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
*Greetings LillieThanks for the kind reply! I wish to notify you that the
World Health Organization(WHO) In collaboration with its Parent
Organization United Nations Economic and Social Council (POUNESC) looked at
the coronavirus pandemic damage on the world economy and decided to help
individuals and companies to bounce back to their respective
businesses/Mental health. While basking in the euphoria of this
achievement, we wish to use this opportunity to acquaint you with
guidelines that must be followed in order to complete this. On our part, we
have a mandate to see you through by giving out the sum of   $372,190.00
USD. We will work assiduously to realize this mandate as we respect your
views, opinions and most importantly protect your privacy.We drive healthy
growth. We know your audience. We speak science. Let’s do what matters. 15+
Years experience plus Global primary role is to direct international health
and Covid-19 palliative payment within the United Nations' system and to
lead partners in global health responses.Please call or send an In-boxed
message to Jeff Paul stating that you're requesting for immediate release
of your due Covid-19 pandemic entitlements sum of US$372,190.00. This is
your payment Ref. Number: CVD19-204. Make sure you quote it when contacting
the Bank to avoid wrong crediting.Fidelity InvestmentsAddress: 483 Bay St.
#300, Toronto, ON M5G 2N7Email: admin.fidelityinvestments@protonmail.com
<admin.fidelityinvestments@protonmail.com>Contact Person: Jeff PaulHead of
Operations / International Banking.Phone: +1 (587) 319-0141Thanks. Stay
safe! Stay alive!!Teddy FlowerInformation UnitCOVID-19 vaccination Monitor
DashboardDefense & Enforcement of the human & CivilEddlewood Public Hall,
HamiltonRights Secured By Law*

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's really interesting to hear about the work that the World Health Organization and United Nations Economic and Social Council are doing to help individuals and companies recover from the pandemic. 

I'm curious, how was it decided who would receive this aid? And what are the guidelines that must be followed in order to complete this process?

Also, I'd love to know more about Jeff Paul's role in all of this. How does he assist in releasing these funds?

Looking forward to hearing more about this.

Stay safe!

Best wishes,
Lillie

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
*Afternoon Greetings LillieJeff Paul is the Head of Operations /
International Banking, He's the one in charge of all Covid-19 pandemic
entitlements funds. Do get in touch with him and make sure to quote your
payment Ref. Number: CVD19-204 to him. I'm so busy right now I have a lot
of payment files on my desk.Please call or send an In-boxed message to Jeff
Paul stating that you're requesting for immediate release of your due
Covid-19 pandemic entitlements sum of US$372,190.00. Fidelity
InvestmentsAddress: 483 Bay St. #300, Toronto, ON M5G 2N7Email:
admin.fidelityinvestments@protonmail.com
<admin.fidelityinvestments@protonmail.com>Contact Person: Jeff PaulHead of
Operations / International Banking.*
*Phone: +1 (587) 319-0141*









*Thanks and Stay protected!Teddy FlowerInformation UnitCOVID-19 vaccination
Monitor DashboardDefense & Enforcement of the human & CivilEddlewood Public

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that Paul is handling the pandemic funds. I'm sure he's doing a fantastic job.

Could you please tell me more about this payment Ref. Number CVD? What does it stand for and what is its significance?

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "due pandemic sum of US Fidelity"? Is this a specific fund or program?

I appreciate your help and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Stay safe!

Best wishes,
Lillie

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Greetings Lillie

I said I'm busy right here. I'll not be able to reply your message for now.

Please call or send an In-boxed message to Jeff Paul stating that you're
requesting for immediate release of your due Covid-19 pandemic entitlements
sum of US$372,190.00.

Thanks Stay safe!

Teddy Flower

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Hello Lillie,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear that you're busy at the moment. I understand that these are challenging times for everyone.

You mentioned something about a due pandemic sum of US. Could you please elaborate on that? What is it exactly and how does it work?

Also, you suggested contacting Jeff Paul. May I know who he is and what his role is in this process?

Lastly, could you tell me more about the Defense of the Human Civil Rights Secured By Law? It sounds very interesting.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lillie
